abstract: A couple of former Merrill Lynch Capital executives have been busy in the seven months since the bank agreed to sell its lending unit to GE Capital, according to The Deal.com
lead_paragraph: A couple of former Merrill Lynch Capital executives have been busy in the seven months since the bank agreed to sell its lending unit to GE Capital, according to The Deal.com

headline.main: Former ML Capital Executives to Start New Funds, Report Says
